de.mrapp.android.dialog.listener

Class OnClickListenerWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.dialog.listener.AbstractListenerWrapper
      • de.mrapp.android.dialog.listener.OnClickListenerWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnClickListener

    public class OnClickListenerWrapper
extends AbstractListenerWrapper
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    A wrapper, which implements the interface View.OnClickListener in order to delegate the method calls to encapsulated listener of the type DialogInterface.OnClickListener.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OnClickListenerWrapper(android.content.DialogInterface.OnClickListener listener, boolean validate, MaterialDialog dialog, int buttonType)
      Creates a new wrapper, which implements the interface View.OnClickListener in order to delegate the method calls to encapsulated listener of the type DialogInterface.OnClickListener.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • OnClickListenerWrapper

        public OnClickListenerWrapper(android.content.DialogInterface.OnClickListener listener,
                              boolean validate,
                              MaterialDialog dialog,
                              int buttonType)
        Creates a new wrapper, which implements the interface View.OnClickListener in order to delegate the method calls to encapsulated listener of the type DialogInterface.OnClickListener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener, which should be encapsulated by the wrapper, as an instance of the type DialogInterface.OnClickListener or null, if no listener should be encapsulated
        validate - True, if the dialog, the listener belongs to, should be validated when the listener is called, false otherwise
        dialog - The dialog, the listener should belong to, as an instance of the class MaterialDialog. The dialog may not be null
        buttonType - The type of the button or list item, the listener belongs to, as an Integer value

    • Method Detail

      • onClick

        public final void onClick(android.view.View v)
        Specified by:
        onClick in interface android.view.View.OnClickListener
